website_summaries.verdict: Delivers a high level of protein per serving, while limiting the carbs, sugars, and calories.
pros: Has 24 grams of protein per serving, which helps with muscle gain
Seems to be easy to digest
Texture works nicely in a variety of recipes, or you can mix it with liquid for a protein shake
Will give you 5.25 grams of BCAAs per serving for workout recovery
cons: Price is a little high per ounce
Fat content is a little high

customer_reviews.title: Eh, disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Pretty disappointed with the product. After all the reviews I read I had decent expectations. I will say that they protein does what it’s supposes to do, I have noticed I’ve leaned up a bit since adding this product to my daily routine. However, the flavor is NOT good. It’s got that typical whey taste, but it’s so strong it’s almost impossible to mask. It’s also extremely thick so anything you mix it with come out like 3 times the thickness of pancake batter. Overall I wouldn’t purchased again.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin R.

customer_reviews.title: Weird aftertaste
customer_reviews.text: Leaves funky aftertaste. I try mixing it with variously fruits n veggies and it didn’t make a difference.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Taste good
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this brand for years now. It’s my favorite. I use almond milk, pb2 powder then I add fruit, flax seed
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa Giaccone

customer_reviews.title: Just like a shake!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! I love the taste, thickness and what it does for me. I have been using this product for over 5 years. I hope they never change a thing. I can not say enough about how much I love the thickness of this product, after all, who want to drink a protein shake that is thin as water?🤔please keep making this just like it is!
customer_reviews.author: Dennis w webb

customer_reviews.title: Good price and good taste
customer_reviews.text: I use it in shakes, blend it with banana ice skin milk.
customer_reviews.author: Miriam

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this protein powder. It is nice that it is not too expensive. My one complaint would be the vanilla flavor is very strong and is sometimes too sweet for me. Other than that, I totally recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Claypoole

customer_reviews.title: I’m not picky but this simply doesn’t taste good
customer_reviews.text: If you want protein, it’ll get you protein but it isn’t enjoyable in the slightest. I forced myself to finish it because I wasn’t going to waste but it was certainly not something I was looking forward to.
customer_reviews.author: Zarvaan

customer_reviews.title: protien drink
customer_reviews.text: Enjoying the protein drink. Seems to be keeping me healthy.
customer_reviews.author: Charles A. Tornabene

customer_reviews.title: Five star
customer_reviews.text: I know a lot of people are concerned with taste, so I'll right up front that the taste is good. Vanilla is delicious. I also like that it has a smaller scoop. Two scoops per serving. The smaller size is nice because large scoops being dropped into my little blender will send a cloud of powder onto my hand and counter. Other than that, it's protein powder. Not much to say about it.
customer_reviews.author: adam

customer_reviews.title: Tastes sooooo good!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great protein powder. It tastes great and dissolves completely in our blender bottles with ease. This is my favorite protein powder we have tried so far, will definitely be buying more in different flavors. 10/10 recommend
customer_reviews.author: Tuesday

customer_reviews.title: Won’t mix well and very thick
customer_reviews.text: I normally love this company. But this product is is just not good. 1. It takes 3 scoops to get to 36gr proteins which make the shake very heavy and thick 2. It just doesn’t blend well and stay chunky.
customer_reviews.author: Itta w

customer_reviews.title: Cellucor Cor-performance
customer_reviews.text: Love the simplicity of a blueberry or strawberry nutribullet shake made with Cellucor. Since last summer I’ve lost 40#’s!
customer_reviews.author: sharon

customer_reviews.title: Best one I’ve tried!
customer_reviews.text: Great flavor and mixes smooth. Isn’t gritty at all. I usually carry bottled water and just shake.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi H

customer_reviews.title: This is the best Whey ever made!!!
customer_reviews.text: This product was for my son. We have tried all the WHEY products that you can buy in the store. My son states that this one is the best. He also stated that the powder is lighter and therefore even with the ball in the mixer cup, IT DOES NOT CLUMP UP!!! He normally always drank the chocolate flavor and this time I ordered him the whipped vanilla powder which had 5 stars and great reviews so that's why I had originally ordered this brand. I highly recommend this product!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Pslhull

product_meta.title: Cellucor COR-Performance Protein Powder Whipped Vanilla | 100% Gluten Free + Low Fat Post Workout Muscle Growth Drink for Men & Women | 28 Servings
product_meta.description: Flavor:Vanilla| Size:1.96 Pound (Pack of 1)COR-Performance Whey Protein is an optimal source of protein when you’re looking to build and maintain lean muscle, replenish nutrients after a workout, and indulge your sweet tooth guilt-free.
feature_bullets: Whey Protein Isolate as Primary Source
TruFacts Full Disclosure Label & Manufactured in a GMP Compliant Facility

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping.
